scripts.bootstrap: lerna clean --yes && lerna bootstrap --hoist && lerna run compile --stream
scripts.cleanall: lerna run clean; lerna clean --yes && rm -fr node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.lint: lerna run tslint --stream; lerna run tsc --stream
scripts.test: npm run bootstrap && npm run lint && npm run testonly
scripts.testguomi: lerna run compile --stream && lerna run build --stream && lerna run test:guomi --stream
scripts.testonly: lerna run compile --stream && lerna run build --stream && lerna run test --stream && lerna run test:guomi --stream
scripts.testreal: lerna run compile --stream && lerna run build --stream && lerna run test:api --stream
